errors.error_description: References a requirements file path that likely doesn't exist in the repository structure
correction_candidates: Use 'pip install iris-grib' to install directly from PyPI
Change path to 'pip install -r requirements.txt' (without the ./requirements/ subdirectory)
Install from the repository with 'pip install git+https://github.com/SciTools/iris-grib.git'
Use 'pip install -e .' for development installation from the current directory
errors.golden_answer: Use 'pip install iris-grib' to install directly from PyPI
